title: The Sandman
description: Leila: a girl destined to marry a man she despises. She is disobedient, kind, shameful, smart, and everything a girl like her shouldnâ€™t be.The Sandman: your imagination; your conscience; your free will.In a terrible desert of pain and self-discovery, the two shall meet.Truths shall be revealed...
author: Alex Stargazer
